title: GARNIER WHOLE BLENDS: GOOD FOR YOUR HAIR & THE WORLD WE LIVE IN | GARNIER WHOLE BLENDS
description: Good for your hair and the world we live in, see how GARNIER WHOLE BLENDS paraben-free formulas gently nourish, hydrate, and repair for naturally beautiful hair.

asset.author: GarnierUSA
asset.description:

transcripts: For naturally beautiful hair discover the wholesome goodness of whole blend shampoos and conditioners by Garnier, the sweetness of honey and royal jelly, the freshness of coconut water and vanilla milk we blend only our best into whole blends paraben-free haircare carefully selected ingredients in formulas made to nourish deeply, hydrate, and repair garnier whole blend wholesome loving care blended for naturally beautiful hair find your blend.
